en.label: Roshar Calendar (Stormlight Archive)
en.description: The Vorin calendar used on Roshar in Brandon Sanderson's Stormlight Archive series. Features ten months of fifty days each, organized into ten weeks of five days per month, with the unique Year.Month.Week.Day date format used by the Alethi and other Vorin cultures.

intercalary.name: The Weeping
intercalary.description: A four-week period of constant rain marking the end of the year. No highstorms occur during this time, and gemstones cannot be infused with Stormlight. Contains Lightday, a single clear day in the middle of the period.
